low-paid.translation[0].definitions[0].d: providing or earning only a small amount of money
low-paid.translation[0].definitions[0].e: As part-time, low-paid workers, the women earned very little.
low-paid.translation[1].definitions[0].d: earning only a small amount from your job
low-paid.translation[1].definitions[1].e: We shall continue to reduce tax, especially for the low-paid.
